column1: Smoque BBQ////First time there. What wonderful BBQ! The brisket
column3: St Louis ribs were all amazing! That brisket is to die for. The baked beans and mac and cheese were terriific sides. If you don't mind the wait
column4: we waited about 50 minutes from the time we got in line to the time we got our food
column5: it is well worth it!! The place is a little small and seating is tight. But the price is right and the food is off the charts. I'm a huge fan and can't wait to get back there.
